charges.charge_description: Activities re Material Constituting/Containing Child Porno - Possession of Child Pornography (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to Custody For A Term of 60 Months. Upon Release Shall be on Supervised Release For A Term of 5 Years. Fine in The $10,000.00 Payable at A Rate of $100.00 Per Month Shall Pay All or A Portion of Costs Associated With Computer Monitoring Based on Ability to Pay as Determined by The U.S. Probation Office. Special Assessment of $100.00 For Count 1 Due Immediately.
